verses.verse: Draw<WH7126> near,<WH7126> O nations,<WH1471> to hear;<WH8085> and listen,<WH7181> O peoples!<WH3816> Let the earth<WH776> and all it contains<WH4393> hear,<WH8085> and the world<WH8398> and all<WH3605> that springs<WH6631> from it.

For the Lord's indignation<WH7110> is against<WH5921> all<WH3605> the nations,<WH1471> And [His] wrath<WH2534> against<WH5921> all<WH3605> their armies;<WH6635> He has utterly<WH2763> destroyed<WH2763> them, He has given<WH5414> them over to slaughter.<WH2874>

So their slain<WH2491> will be thrown<WH7993> out, And their corpses<WH6297> will give<WH5927> off<WH5927> their stench,<WH889> And the mountains<WH2022> will be drenched<WH4549> with their blood.<WH1818>

And all<WH3605> the host<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> will wear<WH4743> away,<WH4743> And the sky<WH8064> will be rolled<WH1556> up like a scroll;<WH5612> All<WH3605> their hosts<WH6635> will also wither<WH5034> away<WH5034> As a leaf<WH5929> withers<WH5034> from the vine,<WH1612> Or as [one] withers<WH5034> from the fig<WH8384> tree.<WH8384>

For My sword<WH2719> is satiated<WH7301> in heaven,<WH8064> Behold<WH2009> it shall descend<WH3381> for judgment<WH4941> upon Edom,<WH9000> And upon the people<WH5971> whom I have devoted<WH9172> to destruction.<WH4941>

The sword<WH2719> of the Lord<WH3068> is filled<WH4390> with blood,<WH1818> It is sated<WH1878> with fat,<WH2459> with the blood<WH1818> of lambs<WH3733> and goats,<WH6260> With the fat<WH2459> of the kidneys<WH3629> of rams.<WH352> For the Lord<WH3068> has a sacrifice<WH2077> in Bozrah,<WH1224> And a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH2874> in the land<WH776> of Edom.<WH9000>

Wild<WH7214> oxen<WH7214> shall also fall<WH3381> with them, And young<WH6499> bulls<WH6499> with strong<WH47> ones;<WH47> Thus their land<WH776> shall be soaked<WH7301> with blood,<WH1818> And their dust<WH6083> become<WH1878> greasy<WH1878> with fat.<WH2459>
For the Lord<WH3068> has a day<WH3117> of vengeance,<WH5359> A year<WH8141> of recompense<WH7966> for the cause<WH7379> of Zion.<WH6726>
And its streams<WH5158> shall be turned<WH2015> into pitch,<WH2203> And its loose<WH6083> earth<WH6083> into brimstone,<WH1614> And its land<WH776> shall become<WH1961> burning<WH1197> pitch.<WH2203>

It shall not be quenched<WH3518> night<WH3915> or day;<WH3119> Its smoke<WH6227> shall go<WH5927> up forever;<WH5769> From generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> it shall be desolate;<WH2717> None<WH369> shall pass<WH5674> through it forever<WH5331> and ever.<WH5331>

But pelican<WH6893> and hedgehog<WH7090> shall possess<WH3423> it, And owl<WH3244> and raven<WH6158> shall dwell<WH7931> in it; And He shall stretch<WH5186> over<WH5921> it the line<WH6957> of desolation<WH8414> And the plumb<WH68> line<WH68> of emptiness.<WH922>
Its nobles<WH2715> – there<WH369> is no<WH369> one<WH369> there<WH8033> [Whom] they may proclaim<WH7121> king<WH4410> – And all<WH3605> its princes<WH8269> shall be nothing.<WH657>

And thorns<WH9359> shall come<WH5927> up in its fortified<WH4013> towers,<WH759> Nettles<WH7057> and thistles<WH2336> in its fortified<WH4013> cities;<WH4013> It shall also be a haunt<WH5116> of jackals<WH8565> [And] an abode<WH2681> of ostriches.<WH3284>

And the desert<WH9478> creatures<WH9478> shall meet<WH6298> with the wolves,<WH338> The hairy<WH9617> goat<WH8163> also shall cry<WH7121> to its kind;<WH7453> Yes,<WH389> the night<WH3917> monster<WH3917> shall settle<WH7280> there<WH8033> And shall find<WH4672> herself a resting<WH4494> place.<WH4494>

The tree<WH7091> snake<WH7091> shall make<WH7077> its nest<WH7077> and lay<WH4422> [eggs] there,<WH8033> And it will hatch<WH1234> and gather<WH1716> [them] under its protection.<WH6738> Yes,<WH389> the hawks<WH1772> shall be gathered<WH6908> there,<WH8033> Every<WH802> one<WH376> with its kind.<WH7468>

Seek<WH1875> from the book<WH5612> of the Lord,<WH3068> and read:<WH7121> Not one<WH259> of these<WH2007> will be missing;<WH5737> None<WH802> <WH3808> will lack<WH6485> its mate.<WH7468> For His mouth<WH6310> has commanded,<WH6680> And His Spirit<WH7307> has gathered<WH6908> them.

And He has cast<WH5307> the lot<WH1486> for them, And His hand<WH3027> has divided<WH2505> it to them by line.<WH6957> They shall possess<WH3423> it forever<WH5704>;<WH5769> From generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755> they shall dwell<WH7931> in it.
